title: ENCODE Biosample
description: Schema for submitting an ENCODE Biosample

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

description.description: A plain text description of the biosample - please not contructs and treatments, and experimental intent.

source.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE source UUID or unique Source name
source.title: Biosample Source

lot_id.description: A lot code for the biosample
lot_id.title: Biosample Lot ID

constructs.comment: For automatic submission this is a list of unique references to construct objects.

items.description: Transfection, fusion, or Zn-finger KO construct name or uuid
items.title: Constructs

constructs.title: List of Constructs

rnais.description: List of RNAi construct object identifiers
rnais.comment: For automatic submission this is a list of unique references to RNAi objects.

items.description: si or shRNA construct name or uuid
items.title: RNAi Constructs

rnais.title: List of RNAi objects.

treatments.description: Substances used to treat a biosample
treatments.comment: For automatic submission this is a list of unique references to RNAi objects.

items.description: Treatment (names or UUIDs) applied to biosample
items.title: Biosample Treatment

encode2_dbxrefs.description: List cross-references to the previous ENCODE2 system
encode2_dbxrefs.title: ENCODE2 DBXREFs

protocol_documents.description: List of biosample protocols associated with this biosample
protocol_documents.comment: For automatic submission supply unique documents names or uuids
protocol_documents.title: Protocol Document List

validation_documents.description: List of validation protocols associated with this biosample (treatment)
validation_documents.comment: For automatic submission supply unique documents names or uuids
validation_documents.title: Validation Document List

donor.comment: For automatic submission, supply a ENCODE donor accession or uuid
donor.title: Donor

derived_from.description: List of biosamples this biosample is derived from
derived_from.title: List of Biosample Parents

items.description: Biosample that this sample derives from via a construct or treatment
items.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE biosample accession or uuid
items.title: Parent (derived_from) Biosample

contained_in.description: List of biosamples this biosample is contained in (reverse of pooled from)
contained_in.title: List of Biosample Parents

items.description: Biosample that this sample is contained in
items.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE biosample accession or uuid
items.title: Parent (contained_in) Biosample

part_of.description: List of biosamples this biosample part of
part_of.title: List of Biosample Parents

items.description: Biosample that this sample is part of
items.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE biosample accession or uuid
items.title: Parent (part_of) Biosample

subcellular_fraction.description: The subcomponent of cells/tissues isolated for specific library prep
subcellular_fraction.comment: Terms are from the GO Cellular Component ontology
subcellular_fraction.title: Subcellular Fraction

phase.description: Cell-cycle phase in which cells were harvested
phase.title: Cell-cycle phase

transfection_type.description: The in-cell longevity of the transfection construct (if it exists)
transfection_type.title: Transfection type (stability)
